title: Blog-Based Reflective Peer Learning Design in Online Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A short-term program operating in smartphone-centric limited technological environments, allowing current practitioners to participate while balancing work commitments

learning_goals: Learners can write reflective learning logs three or more times per week using blogs
Learners can provide constructive feedback on peers' blog posts at least once per week
Learners can structure and reflect on learning content according to the ICE model (Idea-Connection-Extension)
Learners can build a collaborative learning network with peers through digital texts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
